cxro.common.io.modbus.client

Class ModbusMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • cxro.common.io.modbus.client.ModbusMessage

  • public final class ModbusMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    Manage the Modbus Protocol Data Unit (PDU).

    This class actually encapsulates the full ModbusTCP Application Data Unit (ADU = TCP_Header + PDU). However, ModbusMessage is only responsible for the Modbus PDU portion of the ADU. The ModbusTCP header is the responsibility of ModbusChannel.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModbusMessage()
      Constructs a new ModbusMessage instance, uses default header values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.nio.ByteBuffer getData()
      Gets the message data from this ModbusMessage.
      The message data corresponds to the remaining bytes following the function code in a modbus message (up to 252 bytes).
      int getDataLength()
      Get the length of the payload message data.
      int getExceptionCode()
      Get modbus response exception code
      int getFunctionCode()
      Gets the function code of this ModbusMessage.
      boolean isException()
      Test for ModbusServerException

      Sets the message data from this ModbusMessage.
      The message data corresponds to the remaining bytes following the function code in a modbus message (up to 252 bytes).
      void setFunctionCode(int num)
      Sets the function code of this ModbusMessage.
      The identifier should be a 1-byte non negative integer value valid in the range of 0-255.
      java.lang.String toHexString()
      Returns this message as hexadecimal string.

      • setData

        public void setData(java.nio.ByteBuffer data)

        The message data corresponds to the remaining bytes following the function code in a modbus message (up to 252 bytes).

        Parameters:

      • getDataLength

        public int getDataLength()
        Get the length of the payload message data.

        This corresponds to the MBAP_LENGTH minus the UNIT_ID and FUNCTION_CODE bytes.

        Returns:
        the payload data length as int.

      • toHexString

        public java.lang.String toHexString()
        Returns this message as hexadecimal string. Only return the PDU portion of the message. Ignore the MBAP portion which is managed by ModbusChannel.
        Returns:
        the message as hex encoded string.
